website_summaries.verdict: For anyone looking for a modern doorbell, this is a no-brainer. The touch-activated interface is very responsive and easy to use.
pros: Completely weatherproof model can stand up to the elements
Touch is extremely sensitive, making it easy to use
Simple installation and loud volume makes it easy to never miss a visitor or delivery
Stylish and modern look is complementary to any home
cons: Sometimes visitors don’t immediately recognize device as a doorbell

customer_reviews.title: Great doggie doorbell
customer_reviews.text: My puppy uses this doorbell to let me know he needs to go outside. I put peanut butter on it to train him to lick it, then opened the door and gave him a treat. I put the 2 receivers in different rooms. Works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: This doorbell works great except that it has a bunch of different tones but you can’t use them. When you change the tone, It just keeps defaulting back to the original tone when you ring the bell. It works great for my dogs paw.
customer_reviews.author: James Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good Sounds From the Door
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in December and I waited to write my review as I wanted to see how it stood up to South Florida Summer weather. I have to say it's done really well baking in the Florida sun outside my door. It works well and I love the adjustable sounds. My doorbell isn't an ugly eyesore and the ringtone I picked isn't obnoxious like many others I've heard, most people don't even know it's the doorbell chime when they hear it for the first time. I also like that is came with 2 doorbell notification boxes so if I want to add one to my upstairs I can and it's so simple to set up.
customer_reviews.author: SF Gator Mom

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: The best wireless doorbell I ever used, I been through many from the local stores and they all seem to have trouble with distance, walls, etc. These work great
customer_reviews.author: Derek N

customer_reviews.title: Short life, finicky remote, difficult to get right
customer_reviews.text: Worked OK, but the battery on the remote runs out so quickly. Lasts about 2 months. It's also difficult to know exactly where to push on the remote. When I did get visitors that use it and the battery was fresh, they would touch the remote and nothing would happen. They just happened to touch in the wrong place. You really don't want people having to get up close and squint at it to figure out what to do. It's very inconvienet. Ended up getting a nest and hardwired it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our dog uses this to tell us she needs to potty
customer_reviews.text: We smear a little peanut butter oil on the ringer and our 3-pound maltipoo noses and licks it to let us know she needs to go outside. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Beddow

customer_reviews.title: this one's for the Dogs
customer_reviews.text: got this to teach the dog how to tell us she needs to go out. mounted on a book case by the front door (appartment with no backyard) and put the speaker in a plug near the TV so we can hear it. works like a charm. it doesn't notice when it should stop ringing if its hit with something wet ( like a dogs nose) but it auto stops of after about ten seconds anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew R.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Sounds good. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: I installed the unit and it works perfectly. There are very few good looking units out there and I was pleased to find this one. I installed the button with the screws supplied rather than the tape provided. It was easy to remove the internal circuit board by removing one tiny screw then reattaching it once the button was screwed to the wall. Having just installed it, I can only say that it looks and sounds great. The lifetime 100% money back guarantee is definitely plus.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Wish the doorbell icon always displayed as blue
customer_reviews.text: Our new apt did not have a doorbell and having people knock on the door to various loudness levels was annoying and intrusive. Easy to set-up, can select different tunes, and can hear it easily (have one downstairs and it works there no problem). The symbol on the front doorbell does not appear constant blue -- it is always black until you press it. Having it always black does not make the person at the front door easily understand what it is so they end up knocking anyway. Solved this by taking a white-out pen and coloring in the bell icon so they can better understand it's a doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Fast ship, easy to hook up, and great price! I was worried it wouldn't work because we live in a log cabin, but it works perfectly. I even put the extra one in my basement. I saw the video on the listing and now I want to buy an extra touch sensor and teach my dog to ring it when she wants back in! LOL. What a neat idea!
customer_reviews.author: amy mae

customer_reviews.title: Cool doorbell
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for over a year and works great. Had to recently replace the battery but was easy to find in a store nearby. Has many different sounds, and I put one receiver in the kitchen and the other in a room and they receive the signal.
customer_reviews.author: Relic

customer_reviews.title: Great doorbell at great price
customer_reviews.text: We needed a doorbell after we got rid of our landline. Our previous doorbell was connected through the phone line so requiring was going to be an issue and involve hiring an electrician. Chose this doorbell based on affordable price , aesthetic and decent reviews. It was so easy to install and works really well. Some of the tunes are cheesy but it will be fun to have a Christmas tune at holiday time. We have multiple wifi appliances in our home and have had no problems with interference . Very happy with my purchase might get another one .
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Kingham

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This works really well for my purposes. Great product. Only drawback is you have to scroll through all the sounds to find the chime you want, and once you pass it, you can't go back. Too bad they can't make it easier, for instance using a digital display, to find the chime you like.
customer_reviews.author: Bubbly

customer_reviews.title: not clear where to push
customer_reviews.text: People coming to door are confused about where to put their finger. It does not have a clear "target" so people push wrong place (near top usually) and it does not ring. Works well if you press in the center
customer_reviews.author: mudcat grant

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: It seemed great. However there is nowhere on the device indicating where to press. If people do not press it and exactly the right place, the bell does not ring. There is a sticker to put on there showing where to press, but the sticker is becoming worn from the weather
customer_reviews.author: Jen H

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, audible but several design flaws.
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable but wished it had a larger push button display. Mounting is tricky as well; the door bell should be kept out of the elements and the only way to mount this is with double-sided tape. Now you tell me, how long will it stick in a south-side facing sun all day direction?? Also, the directions state that once you open it (to change battery) you will break the little rubber seal. Not a well thought out design in my opinion. But, the chime is very audible with good distance.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Scolerio

customer_reviews.title: We love this doorbell
customer_reviews.text: We love this doorbell. Our house did not have wiring installed for a doorbell, so we needed a solution that would enable us to have a doorbell we could hear throughout the house. The split nature of the house made the two-receiver option ideal for us as we can hear the bell anywhere we might be. The different tones allow us to switch it up and keep the chimes fresh (which our three-year-old really likes). Overall, this was the perfect solution to a problem for which we, and many other owners of older homes, needed a simple, but effective solution.
customer_reviews.author: KELSEY &.

customer_reviews.title: What you expect at first, but didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Worked pretty well for our puppy learning to potty train , however - I wish the touch area was bigger as she had to be trained for longer because of it. It also began to malfunction after about a month of use and repeated the chime ~10 times over. Pretty annoying. And now it’s too late for me to return. Honestly, I’d go with a different version of the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Love the fact that the ringers can be moved about ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that the ringers can be moved about the house to ensure hearing them. Two ringers are appreciated for zoning the sound. Exterior button has been through tropical storm and still works. Installed ringer on front gate to keep mailman safe from wiener dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Champney

customer_reviews.title: Easy, handy and economical. And a GREAT company to order from!
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to a wired doorbell. It puts the sound in the rooms I spend the most time in! Amazingly easy to install. Two screws for outside and the two ringers are plug and play wherever you want to put them. I had a problem with one of the ringers and the company PROMPTLY sent a full replacement!!
customer_reviews.author: lrkap

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Product has just arrived and been set up, but I am so happy. Easy to work with, able to ring on both stories of brick house. Would be glad to order again. Only drawback is too many ringtones to cycle thru, no easy way to go back to preset tone. Really good product though!
customer_reviews.author: raisin bow

customer_reviews.title: FEMA compliant!
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, only had one person not realize it was a doorbell. So far we set it up and have forgotten about it, since it works so reliably. We can't have power below the floodheight, so we needed battery powered transmitter and wanted a wall connected receiver. This was perfect for us. Just wish it came in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah P.

customer_reviews.title: This product was a great price and system worked better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This product was a great price and system worked better than I expected. I put one in the house and one in my shop in my back yard which is a ways from the front gate and it works perfect too. It's nice to get a product that works better than you are expecting it too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresentation of product
customer_reviews.text: The transmitter came with screws to mount onto a door but no place to put the screws. The inside of the transmitter had the completely impossible mounting option. It was constructed in a way that it could not be mounted. This was very misleading because in the description we are given the option to mount with screws or the adhesive, also included.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I installed the doorbell about 3 weeks ago and it is working very well so far. After installation, I very carefully put clear sealant around the two-sided tape attaching the back of the doorbell to the wooden doorframe, to make it extra weatherproof. It gets full sun all day long, but it hasn't rained hard yet...the final test.
customer_reviews.author: psp

customer_reviews.title: This doorbell is awesome. It really is waterproof and having the two ...
customer_reviews.text: This doorbell is awesome. It really is waterproof and having the two plug in receivers is great. I purchased these for work and put one in the stock room and the other in the office so we can hear when someone is at the backdoor. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof doorbell
customer_reviews.text: I had recently purchased and installed a wireless doorbell from a local big box store. My front door is not covered; therefore, within a few weeks, with some rain off and on, the doorbell was no longer working. I went on a hunt for a waterproof doorbell and decided upon this one. It's been up for about a week, and we have had quite a bit of rain, and it is still working great. Installation was very easy - the most difficult thing to do, was to decide upon what chime/tune to use.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Installing a Doorbell Couldn't be Easier!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice system. Easy to install, very nice system. One thing to look out for is that when the weather is a little cooler it may take a longer touch on the transmitter because it seems to work from heat generated by the hand. Fast delivery, product as advertised, packaged well. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: FishinFamily

customer_reviews.title: Work great and LOVE the volume control
customer_reviews.text: Work great and LOVE the volume control. Goes from soft to quite LOUD!! I can hear it all over the house!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for several months and the only thing I have done is replace the battery once. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: arrived on time, package was secure, product was easily installed and synched. Purchased due to the waterproof outside bell, previous bells were not and was tired of replacing. Found this and am extremely pleased.
customer_reviews.author: daily shopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent so far.....
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far...have 3 level home and spaced the two receivers on middle level and can hear clearly throughout...transmitter seems to be working fine and rings both as stated....currently using tape adhesive to see how it will hold up in southern heat...only downside is that when using screw-in installation, water-tightness may be impacted (according to booklet)...so far so good...
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C

customer_reviews.title: works great, even at fairly long distances
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price and performance of this doorbell. Worked well about 100 feet away, through two walls.
customer_reviews.author: G. Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs
customer_reviews.text: This is the doggie door bell you need. I bought others but they didn't last.
customer_reviews.author: Jason J

customer_reviews.title: Great Doorbell
customer_reviews.text: The doorknocker on our front door is not very loud, so we needed "an easy to install but won't damage the door" doorbell. This doorbell was perfect. Installed it in less than two minutes and we can hear it in any part of the apartment (1600 square feet). I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer 1963

customer_reviews.title: Great delivery time
customer_reviews.text: Great delivery time. Great product. The plug-in receivers are a big improvement over previous wireless doorbells by other manugacturers. I appreciate the number of "chimes" that can be selected. The volume control is a big plus also.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customeralex

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Misleading
customer_reviews.text: It looks clean but this product is not touch activated as one would expect, the transmitter is a hard plastic shell that can be easily removed. I've been trying to figure this thing out for about an hour and still no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Dandre D.

customer_reviews.title: Explore other options/brands
customer_reviews.text: Crappy quality. Liked my other brand I owned much better!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product arrive on time it was easy to install it totally met all of my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Able to choose doorbell ring
customer_reviews.text: Just follow the directions that are included, and the programming of this device is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne P

customer_reviews.title: Have to select the sound every time you unplug it which can be irritating at first but once it is set you are good to go
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as it said it would. Have to select the sound every time you unplug it which can be irritating at first but once it is set you are good to go! Looks great
customer_reviews.author: M Clark

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up , Nice and clear. This one doesnt have any logo in the front, so i liked better than few others on Amazon. Range is pretty good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bijish

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and now we know when someone comes to the house.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L.

customer_reviews.title: Doorbell for dogs
customer_reviews.text: Great doorbell! We use it as a dog bell and it's fantastic when they touch the sensor!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Love this doorbell. Nice to have as an apartment dweller
customer_reviews.author: Rich R

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: The set up was very easy and so far it works quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Bernice

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Work nicely. Wished they were a little louder and the transceiver is a tad finicky, it has to be touched just right.
customer_reviews.author: gmw

customer_reviews.title: Good instructions, music / tones better than average
customer_reviews.text: Good instructions, music / tones better than average, easy to pair, good seal around transmitter, excellent packaging. Recommend over similar items..
customer_reviews.author: Mystery Monk

customer_reviews.title: Needs lit image on push button
customer_reviews.text: Works great, signal goes through brick wall and downstairs in the basement, however it would be great if the image lit up on the push button to indicate that it's a door bell in the dark
customer_reviews.author: Macair

customer_reviews.title: Works and sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! There are many sounds to choose from and is easily heard throughout the house.
customer_reviews.author: Sarge864

customer_reviews.title: These are great--so easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: These are great--so easy to set up. No wires--just plug in an outlet--easy to hear the sound of your choice. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy M.

customer_reviews.title: Fun idea.
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment and wanted a doorbell. This is a cheap way to solve that. I just hate how long it takes to set the doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Wade Falana

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. This replaced a non-working doorbell and it can be heard all over the house. Just Wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Love the volume control when I'm upstairs and all the ...
customer_reviews.text: easiest install ever. Love the volume control when I'm upstairs and all the chimes. Can't wait till Christmas!!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna M

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these look and working perfectly so far!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product. Would be even better if this device ...
customer_reviews.text: •"SadoTech ST-FX-F-BL Touch Activated Wireless Doorbell with 100-Percent Waterproof Button and 1 Plugin Receiver Operating at Over 500' Range". Very Good Product. Would be even better if this device had extra channels to select a different frequency. By adding dip switches in the transmitter & receiver this would allow changing the signal if interference from other devices are causing the receiver to sound off. Other than that this is a very high quality Digital wireless doorbell unit. We use it as a doggy doorbell. Because the doorbell (transmitter is touch sensitive type, (doesn't need to be fully depressed) it's easy to train your dog to use it. Sound quality is top notch. Distance between receiver & transmitter is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Marrone

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: exactly what I needed at a great price and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Rockett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and is in good working condition.
customer_reviews.author: Alilee D. Pillman

customer_reviews.title: So far has kept on working despite some severe rain ...
customer_reviews.text: So far has kept on working despite some severe rain storms. Still have not figured out how to change the tone it plays, however
customer_reviews.author: Mary Norton

customer_reviews.title: touch doorbell system
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product work better than expected recommend it to anybody
customer_reviews.author: Victor Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed for our office to provide accomodation ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed for our office to provide accomodation by clients being able to alert up stairs staff that they are on site.
customer_reviews.author: K Fox

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Looks like a weird battery
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Looks like a weird battery, hope it lasts a while.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Smith

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and adds additional security to may screened entry.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Stoll

customer_reviews.title: Bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. I'm in an apartment, and the double stick tape works on my door with no holes. However, it suddenly stopped working. When I contacted seller, they wanted me to send it back, or make a video of it not working. A month later, I am still trying to work with them, but every time, they just have more questions. Bad customer service for an item costing twenty bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Diane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Working extremely well as a handicap intercom pager. Very effective.
customer_reviews.author: william r bowers

customer_reviews.title: Tasteful design; not so tasteful ringtones
customer_reviews.text: Excellent simple design. Installs easily and works correctly. Would give 5 stars except almost all ringtone choices are tinny song excerpts. Found 2 of 50 that were ok.
customer_reviews.author: Skkippy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking. Easy setup.. Plug and go. Water proof. Overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: Louis Martos

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical with Wireless Doorbells...Was VERY Happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this device. Sound is loud, easy to install. Range has great distance.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Catania

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and looks great. The product was as describe and came as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Swee L. Louie-Der

customer_reviews.title: Would be good if the picture of the bell was actually highlighted
customer_reviews.text: People have a hard time knowing that's it's a doorbell. We got it because it was waterproof as some of the other styles weren't. We've moved it all over the door (like that it can be moved) in hopes that it will catch people's eye and they will ring it. But even with the little sticker saying to ring the bell people don't know what to do. Would be good if the picture of the bell was actually highlighted, like it shows in the picture so it's easily visible. It only lights up when people ring the bell.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, doesn't work reliably.
customer_reviews.text: FXR touch model I couldn't get it to work reliably. Nice tones and design is nice, but it doesn't ring every time I push the button. It lights up, but no tone. Also, choosing a tone is random. Pushing the button gives you random choices. Hard to go through and come back to one you like.
customer_reviews.author: David Pringle

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this product a little over a year ago ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product a little over a year ago and it already stopped working. I replace the battery but it does not work. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: DAJLuvslife

customer_reviews.title: Not working after less than 2 months!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this. Sorry to say that I have only had it for less than 2 months and it is already not working!!! I can not even return it. Do not waste your money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Be aware this only works just past the warranty period
customer_reviews.text: The button for the doorbell has not stopped working checked the battery and replaced still nothing. Be aware when purchasing as you will need to purchase another shortly after purchasing this one!
customer_reviews.author: Frank F.

customer_reviews.title: May be touch activated, but does not have touch screen sensitivity.
customer_reviews.text: Although advertised as "touch activated" do not infer that that the doorbell uses the same technology as modern day touch screens. It is still a very mechanical item (relies on a spring behind the plastic). It was advertised for use with dogs, but I could only get it to ring maybe one in out of every 5 times. Not good for dog training. It's possible I got a dud, but I was still not impressed with the construction of the device. Does have a multitude of song choices though.
customer_reviews.author: Ryder

customer_reviews.title: This product has odd chimes that are more like music/ So much so that the dog does not ...
customer_reviews.text: This product has odd chimes that are more like music/ So much so that the dog does not even bark. The button only works intermittently and we are unable to get both chimes to work. I would return it if I could but waited a few weeks too long.
customer_reviews.author: glenn treibitz

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok half the year
customer_reviews.text: Only works during warm weather. Not great but not bad either, just not what l’d hoped it would be
customer_reviews.author: MauraLJ

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for the first 6 months now it's totally dead
customer_reviews.author: GL

customer_reviews.title: The touch sensor would randomly activate. Had to return ...
customer_reviews.text: The touch sensor would randomly activate. Had to return it. Got one with a mechanical button, much more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Poopkitty

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality, do not make it over 7 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought 6 of them, after 7 months none of them work, not exactly great quality....waterproof mu aXX
customer_reviews.author: PATUTI

customer_reviews.title: it was absolutely easy to install lest then 5 minutes and it is ...
customer_reviews.text: it was absolutely easy to install lest then 5 minutes and it is just perfect for where I needed it. it work great for a couple of day then it just quit.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria L. Sakach

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work consistently and button is hard to notice. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: PaulABQ

customer_reviews.title: not a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Door bell keeps going off by itself, not a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

product_meta.title: SadoTech ST-FXR-BL Touch Activated Wireless Doorbell with 100-Percent Waterproof Button and 2 Plugin Receivers Operating at Over 500' Range with Over 50 Chimes
feature_bullets: AS SEEN ON BUSINESS INSIDER, FOX, ABC, NBC & CBS News - "It's built well, and it has a nice minimalist style" - Business Insider, 08/21/15. Our doorbells are great looking, loud, and reliable
Unique Touch Activated Button Wireless Doorbell. Blue Led lights up when touching the TOUCH AREA of transmitter button. Button is 100% waterproof.
Unique touch activated button wireless doorbell. Blue led lights up when touching the touch area of transmitter button. Button is 100% waterproof
A perfect use case scenario for this product would be if you have a first floor and basement, garage, or second floor and you want both areas to ring from someone pressing a single transmitter button
Over 50+ different ring tones. Operating range of over 500 feet (1000 feet in open area). four levels of adjustable volume from 25Db to 110Db
Easily plug receiver into an electrical outlet (no batteries required for main receiver). ce, fcc, rohs certified
Includes 2 chime units and 1 remote transmitter button, double sided sticker, anchors, screws, and battery for remote transmitter

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars154 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
